server.ai.characters.personalities

Class Personality

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ai.characters.personalities.Personality
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeginnerPersonality

    public abstract class Personality
extends java.lang.Object
    Personality objects allow AIs to share aspects of their playing style with other AIs. This is the root personality object which allows better functionality.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler
